name: ai_search_exa
description: Perform advanced AI-powered semantic search using Exa.ai. Best for complex queries, research topics, and finding high-quality content. Uses neural search to understand context and intent better than traditional keyword search.

query.description: The search query from the user. Can be complex, conversational, or research-oriented

type.description: Search type: 'neural' for AI-powered semantic search, 'keyword' for traditional keyword matching

location.description: Optional location context to enhance search results

includeDomains.description: Optional array of domains to focus the search on (e.g., ['reddit.com', 'stackoverflow.com'])
